text_1_html: There are roughly 73.7 million kids running around America , and about 16 million , or nearly one in five , of them are doing so fueled by food stamps , according to US Census data out yesterday .
text_2_html: In 2014 , an estimated 16 million children , or about one in five , received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children , or one in eight , that received this form of assistance prior to the recession .
text_1: There are roughly 73.7 million kids running around America, and about 16 million, or nearly one in five, of them are doing so fueled by food stamps, according to US Census data out yesterday.
text_2: In 2014, an estimated 16 million children, or about one in five, received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children, or one in eight, that received this form of assistance prior to the recession.
prev_text_2: The rate of children living with married parents who receive food stamps has doubled since 2007.

text_1_html: There are roughly 73.7 million kids running around America , and about 16 million , or nearly one in five , of them are doing so fueled by food stamps , according to US Census data out yesterday .
text_2_html: In 2014 , an estimated 16 million children , or about one in five , received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children , or one in eight , that received this form of assistance prior to the recession .

text_1_html: Specifically , he found what he thinks are hand - hewn and hand - planed joists and foundation walls from the Colonial era .
text_2_html: Photographer Adam Woodward first documented the ancient , hand - planed wood joists and stone foundation in the basement of 50 Bowery last week , and both he and historian David Freeland are convinced that these are the remnants of Bull 's Head .

text_1_html: Local and county police , the Kansas Bureau of Investigation , and the FBI worked 31 years on 5,000 tips and evidence provided by BTK : eight letters to police and media , a victim 's necklace BTK gave to his girl friend , a victim 's driver 's license , BTK 's recorded voice and crime scene semen , thousands of DNA swabs , BTK 's DNA linking to Rader , and facts matching Rader 's biography .
text_2_html: A serial killer known as BTK may have taken a necklace from one of his victims in 1977 and given it to a woman he was dating at the time , authorities said Wednesday .

text_1: As well as presenting an image of a company where Campbell's efforts to create a female-friendly workplace and product were coolly received, the suit also alleges more direct tolerance of sexist comments and attitudes.

prev_text_2: Either way, David Freeland sounded excited as he crossed the threshold where a famous Colonial-era tavern, the Bull's Head, once welcomed thirsty out-of-towners.

text_1_html: As the Blaze notes , Republicans want to scale back the Supplemental Nutritional Assistance Program - arguing that the end of the recession should indicate less need - and trimmed $ 8.6 billion and 850,000 people from its rolls with last year 's farm bill .
text_2_html: The GOP has said the end of the recession should allow Congress to reduce spending on food stamps .
text_1: As the Blaze notes, Republicans want to scale back the Supplemental Nutritional Assistance Program-arguing that the end of the recession should indicate less need-and trimmed $8.6 billion and 850,000 people from its rolls with last year's farm bill.
prev_text_1: The jump signals what Reuters says is a "lop-sided" economic recovery that has left low-income people behind, but it also underscores a fundamental partisan divide over social welfare programs.
text_2: The GOP has said the end of the recession should allow Congress to reduce spending on food stamps.
prev_text_2: The debate over food stamps has led to a sort of chicken-and-egg argument between Republicans and Democrats.

text_1_html: There are currently about 46 million Americans total on food stamps , down from the 2013 peak of 48 million .
text_2_html: The number finally dipped from that peak in 2014 , but just a little , to about 46 million people .
text_1: There are currently about 46 million Americans total on food stamps, down from the 2013 peak of 48 million.
prev_text_1: That number is particularly alarming when compared to pre-recession levels: In 2007, some 9 million, or one in eight, kids were on food stamps.
text_2: The number finally dipped from that peak in 2014, but just a little, to about 46 million people.
prev_text_2: The total number of people using food stamps has almost doubled since the start of the Great Recession, to nearly 48 million in 2013.

text_1_html: While Franks had said he would leave office in January , he now says he will resign Friday after his wife was hospitalized Thursday night " due to an ongoing ailment , " CNN reports .
text_2_html: He said in a statement Friday : " Last night , my wife was admitted to the hospital in Washington , D.C. , due to an ongoing ailment .
text_1: While Franks had said he would leave office in January, he now says he will resign Friday after his wife was hospitalized Thursday night "due to an ongoing ailment," CNN reports.
prev_text_1: Andrea Lafferty, president of the Traditional Values Coalition, says she reported allegations against Franks to House Speaker Paul Ryan in recent weeks, calling his behavior "horrific"-"a powerful man hiring young women, procuring staff, to potentially surrogate children for him."
text_2: He said in a statement Friday: "Last night, my wife was admitted to the hospital in Washington, D.C., due to an ongoing ailment.
prev_text_2: "I accompanied (the former aide) to the meeting in the speaker's office where she said Congressman Trent Franks offered her $5 million if she conceived him a child."

text_1_html: Andrea Lafferty , president of the Traditional Values Coalition , says she reported allegations against Franks to House Speaker Paul Ryan in recent weeks , calling his behavior " horrific"-"a powerful man hiring young women , procuring staff , to potentially surrogate children for him . "
text_2_html: Lafferty said she contacted Ryan 's office last month , after the staffer agreed to discuss the incident with leadership .
text_1: Andrea Lafferty, president of the Traditional Values Coalition, says she reported allegations against Franks to House Speaker Paul Ryan in recent weeks, calling his behavior "horrific"-"a powerful man hiring young women, procuring staff, to potentially surrogate children for him."
prev_text_1: "I was asked a few times to look over a 'contract' to carry his child, and if I would conceive his child, I would be given $5 million," she tells the AP.
text_2: Lafferty said she contacted Ryan's office last month, after the staffer agreed to discuss the incident with leadership.
prev_text_2: WASHINGTON (AP) - A former aide to Republican Rep. Trent Franks has told The Associated Press the congressman repeatedly pressed her to carry his child, at one point offering her $5 million to act as a surrogate mother.

text_1_html: When Tannen Campbell was hired by Magic Leap in 2015 , the Florida company had no women in leadership roles and its only idea to make its product female - friendly was to release a pink version , according to Forbes .
text_2_html: Advertisement " Sadly , because Magic Leap seldom hires and does not actively recruit female candidates , the company loses competitive advantage to products like Microsoft 's Hololens .
text_1: When Tannen Campbell was hired by Magic Leap in 2015, the Florida company had no women in leadership roles and its only idea to make its product female-friendly was to release a pink version, according to Forbes.
prev_text_1: An augmented reality startup is being sued for sex discrimination by the very female executive it hired to make it less of a "boy's club," the Guardian reports.
text_2: Advertisement "Sadly, because Magic Leap seldom hires and does not actively recruit female candidates, the company loses competitive advantage to products like Microsoft's Hololens.
prev_text_2: "The macho bullying atmosphere at Magic Leap fosters a dysfunctional culture which creates chaos and lack of process and structure, hinders the company from achieving key product deadlines (including launch, which has shifted back at least 4 times in Campbell's 1.5 years at the company) and, literally, prevented Campbell from doing the job she was hired to do or achieving the goals she and Abovitz had discussed during her initial interview: helping with the "pink/blue problem" or making Magic Leap less of a "boys club.""

text_1_html: That number is particularly alarming when compared to pre - recession levels : In 2007 , some 9 million , or one in eight , kids were on food stamps .
text_2_html: In 2014 , an estimated 16 million children , or about one in five , received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children , or one in eight , that received this form of assistance prior to the recession .
text_1: That number is particularly alarming when compared to pre-recession levels: In 2007, some 9 million, or one in eight, kids were on food stamps.
prev_text_1: There are roughly 73.7 million kids running around America, and about 16 million, or nearly one in five, of them are doing so fueled by food stamps, according to US Census data out yesterday.
text_2: In 2014, an estimated 16 million children, or about one in five, received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children, or one in eight, that received this form of assistance prior to the recession.
prev_text_2: The rate of children living with married parents who receive food stamps has doubled since 2007.

text_1_html: " I was asked a few times to look over a ' contract ' to carry his child , and if I would conceive his child , I would be given $ 5 million , " she tells the AP .
text_2_html: WASHINGTON ( AP ) - A former aide to Republican Rep. Trent Franks has told The Associated Press the congressman repeatedly pressed her to carry his child , at one point offering her $ 5 million to act as a surrogate mother .
text_1: "I was asked a few times to look over a 'contract' to carry his child, and if I would conceive his child, I would be given $5 million," she tells the AP.
prev_text_1: Franks announced his resignation Thursday ahead of a House Ethics Committee investigation into allegations of sexual harassment, admitting to speaking to two female staffers about surrogacy.
text_2: WASHINGTON (AP) - A former aide to Republican Rep. Trent Franks has told The Associated Press the congressman repeatedly pressed her to carry his child, at one point offering her $5 million to act as a surrogate mother.

text_1_html: French museum officials traveled to New York last month and confirmed the find is indeed the missing Picasso work , which the Centre Georges Pompidou realized was missing from its storerooms in 2001 following a loan request ; it was then valued at more than $ 2.5 million .
text_2_html: French museum officials came to New York last month to examine the painting in person alongside historical records and photographs , and they confirmed that it was " La Coiffeuse . "

text_1_html: Under the Forever GI Bill signed into law by President Trump last year , students are supposed to be paid housing allowance based on where they take the most classes , not on where the school 's main campus is located .
text_2_html: " Come to find out , there were big problems going on at the VA . " There are many veterans , like Baker , in Tennessee and across the country who are still waiting for the Department of Veterans Affairs to clear a backlog created after President Donald Trump signed the Forever GI BIll in 2017 .
text_1: Under the Forever GI Bill signed into law by President Trump last year, students are supposed to be paid housing allowance based on where they take the most classes, not on where the school's main campus is located.
prev_text_1: The aides say they were told by the Department of Veterans Affairs that the VA will not be making retroactive payments to veterans who were underpaid for their housing allowance because it would mean reviewing around 2 millions claims, further delaying implementation of a new system, which has already been pushed back to Dec. 2019.
text_2: "Come to find out, there were big problems going on at the VA." There are many veterans, like Baker, in Tennessee and across the country who are still waiting for the Department of Veterans Affairs to clear a backlog created after President Donald Trump signed the Forever GI BIll in 2017.
prev_text_2: We were angry because we figured this would be automatic," Baker said.

text_1_html: A major snafu has hit benefit payments to student veterans under the GI Bill - and congressional aides tells NBC that they have been told the veterans are never going to be paid back .
text_2_html: These problems have contributed to a backlog of claims for veterans using the Post-9/11 GI Bill to attend school this fall , and the agency has come under fire in recent months as thousands of student veterans have had to wait longer than usual for their tuition and housing payments .
text_1: A major snafu has hit benefit payments to student veterans under the GI Bill-and congressional aides tells NBC that they have been told the veterans are never going to be paid back.
text_2: These problems have contributed to a backlog of claims for veterans using the Post-9/11 GI Bill to attend school this fall, and the agency has come under fire in recent months as thousands of student veterans have had to wait longer than usual for their tuition and housing payments.
prev_text_2: The big delay comes after months of technology hiccups that have plagued the agency, which failed to meet the original Aug. 1 deadline to put the changes in place.

text_1_html: French museum officials traveled to New York last month and confirmed the find is indeed the missing Picasso work , which the Centre Georges Pompidou realized was missing from its storerooms in 2001 following a loan request ; it was then valued at more than $ 2.5 million .
text_2_html: The canvas had been smuggled out of a storeroom of the Centre Georges Pompidou , the Paris museum and arts center , and its whereabouts had not been known .
text_1: French museum officials traveled to New York last month and confirmed the find is indeed the missing Picasso work, which the Centre Georges Pompidou realized was missing from its storerooms in 2001 following a loan request; it was then valued at more than $2.5 million.

text_2: The canvas had been smuggled out of a storeroom of the Centre Georges Pompidou, the Paris museum and arts center, and its whereabouts had not been known.
prev_text_2: The 1911 painting, "La Coiffeuse," which translates to "The Hairdresser," was unearthed in December in a FedEx shipment from Belgium to Newark.

text_1_html: The " highly decorated " former Army Ranger 's list of accomplishments is a long one considering his 34 years : In addition to being " active " at the finish line after the Boston Marathon bombs went off , he helped save Richard Donohue Jr. , the officer who lost all his blood after his femoral vein was severed during an exchange of fire with Tamerlan and Dzhokhar Tsarnaev .
text_2_html: In April 2013 , Moynihan was among officers who helped save transit officer Richard H. Donohue Jr. , who was shot during a gunfight involving Tamerlan and Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in the days after the marathon bombings .

text_2: In April 2013, Moynihan was among officers who helped save transit officer Richard H. Donohue Jr., who was shot during a gunfight involving Tamerlan and Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in the days after the marathon bombings.
prev_text_2: A six-year police veteran and member of the youth violence task force, Moynihan was shot below the right eye.

text_1_html: A weird development in the investigation of the alleged robbery of Ryan Lochte and three others US swimmers in Rio : A judge there on Wednesday ordered the passports of Lochte and fellow swimmer James Feigen seized , reports the AP .
text_2_html: American swimmers Gunnar Bentz and Jack Conger were ordered not to leave Brazil until they give a statement to police about a reported incident in which they and two other US swimmers say they were robbed , an attorney for Bentz and Conger said .

text_1_html: The Da Vinci Code has sold so many copies - that would be at least 80 million - that it 's bound to turn up in book donation piles .
text_2_html: Having sold more than 80 million copies of The Da Vinci Code and had all four of his novels on the New York Times bestseller list in the same week , it 's hardly surprising that Brown 's hefty tomes are being donated to charity by readers keen to make some room on their shelves .

text_1_html: Days after authorities confirmed a Florida man died when his vape pen exploded , sending projectiles into his brain , a study published in the journal Pediatrics tells of an 18-year - old Pennsylvania woman who ended up in an emergency room with a cough and stabbing chest pains after trying vaping for only a few weeks .
text_2_html: The hostess had been vaping for only about three weeks last year when she developed symptoms bad enough to send her to the emergency room of the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center .

text_1_html: In what was seen as an homage to Kawakubo , she wore a frothy pink Giambattista Valli ensemble and had a bob cut that Vogue notes had an " unmistakable likeness to the trademark haircut of the night 's honorary designer . "
text_2_html: They also head up Oscar de la Renta , and they scored a win for that house , too , dressing Zoe Kravitz in a pale pink and black caped gown , a classic - looking style that she managed to make modern with her new closely cropped ' do .
text_1: In what was seen as an homage to Kawakubo, she wore a frothy pink Giambattista Valli ensemble and had a bob cut that Vogue notes had an "unmistakable likeness to the trademark haircut of the night's honorary designer."
prev_text_1: She wore a floor-sweeping Ralph Lauren trenchcoat gown that "took up a lot of real estate on the carpet, which is actually blue this year," the AP notes.
text_2: They also head up Oscar de la Renta, and they scored a win for that house, too, dressing Zoe Kravitz in a pale pink and black caped gown, a classic-looking style that she managed to make modern with her new closely cropped 'do.
prev_text_2: The other Lauren looks on the carpet felt a bit forced, including Priyanka Chopra''s extra, extra-long trench gown with train and Dracula-like collar.

text_1_html: After blowing through the initial deadline to bring its GI Bill housing stipends in line with the Forever GI Bill law , Veterans Affairs Department officials said Wednesday that they will not be able to implement the fix until December 2019 .
text_2_html: Because of those issues , the VA had announced earlier on Wednesday that it would delay the Forever GI Bill housing allowance changes until December 2019 - and again promised that retroactive payments would be made to those who did not receive a correct amount .
text_1: After blowing through the initial deadline to bring its GI Bill housing stipends in line with the Forever GI Bill law, Veterans Affairs Department officials said Wednesday that they will not be able to implement the fix until December 2019.
text_2: Because of those issues, the VA had announced earlier on Wednesday that it would delay the Forever GI Bill housing allowance changes until December 2019 - and again promised that retroactive payments would be made to those who did not receive a correct amount.
prev_text_2: When its computers were unable to process that change, the VA quickly faced a backlog of veterans' claims three times higher than normal.

text_1_html: The delay caused a backlog of claims , meaning thousands of students had to wait for their benefits just as they were headed back to school for the fall semester .
text_2_html: These problems have contributed to a backlog of claims for veterans using the Post-9/11 GI Bill to attend school this fall , and the agency has come under fire in recent months as thousands of student veterans have had to wait longer than usual for their tuition and housing payments .
text_1: The delay caused a backlog of claims, meaning thousands of students had to wait for their benefits just as they were headed back to school for the fall semester.
prev_text_1: As a result, the VA waited until July 16 to tell schools to begin enrolling students.
text_2: These problems have contributed to a backlog of claims for veterans using the Post-9/11 GI Bill to attend school this fall, and the agency has come under fire in recent months as thousands of student veterans have had to wait longer than usual for their tuition and housing payments.
prev_text_2: The big delay comes after months of technology hiccups that have plagued the agency, which failed to meet the original Aug. 1 deadline to put the changes in place.

text_1_html: In 2014 , an estimated 16 million children , or about one in five , received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children , or one in eight , that received this form of assistance prior to the recession .

text_1_html: Founded in 2010 , the company is developing an augmented reality headset that superimposes virtual objects onto the real world , and has amassed $ 1.4 billion from the likes Google and Alibaba , despite no announced product for sale yet .
text_2_html: The company , a startup best known for securing a valuation in the billions despite never publicly demonstrating its technology , is being sued by Tannen Campbell , its former head of , and later vice - president of , strategic marketing and brand identity .
text_1: Founded in 2010, the company is developing an augmented reality headset that superimposes virtual objects onto the real world, and has amassed $1.4 billion from the likes Google and Alibaba, despite no announced product for sale yet.

text_1_html: A weird development in the investigation of the alleged robbery of Ryan Lochte and three others US swimmers in Rio : A judge there on Wednesday ordered the passports of Lochte and fellow swimmer James Feigen seized , reports the AP .
text_2_html: RIO DE JANEIRO ( AP ) - A Brazilian judge has ordered that the passports of American swimmers Ryan Lochte and James Feigen be seized as authorities investigate their claim they were robbed at gunpoint during the Rio de Janeiro Olympic Games .

text_1_html: In 2014 , an estimated 16 million children , or about one in five , received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children , or one in eight , that received this form of assistance prior to the recession .
text_2_html: WASHINGTON The number of children in the United States relying on food stamps for a meal spiked to 16 million last year , according federal data , signaling a lopsided economic recovery in which lower income families are still lagging behind .
text_1: In 2014, an estimated 16 million children, or about one in five, received food stamp assistance compared with the roughly 9 million children, or one in eight, that received this form of assistance prior to the recession.

text_1_html: " There was no effort to detain anyone , but police did have further questions this a.m. , " a US Olympic Committee spokesman tells CNN , following a visit by Brazilian police to Olympic Village .
text_2_html: American swimmers Gunnar Bentz and Jack Conger have left the Rio airport after being pulled off their plane for questioning , according to a statement from the Untied States Olympic Committee .

text_1_html: Missed deadlines Campbell , who is suing for Magic Leap for sex discrimination , retaliation and hostile work environment , connects the lack of women in Magic Leap 's leadership and engineering department with claims of missed internal deadlines .
text_2_html: Ultimately , these workplace problems , the lawsuit reads , " renders it so dysfunctional it continues to delay the launch of a product that attracted billions of investment dollars . "
text_1: Missed deadlines Campbell, who is suing for Magic Leap for sex discrimination, retaliation and hostile work environment, connects the lack of women in Magic Leap's leadership and engineering department with claims of missed internal deadlines.
prev_text_1: Magic Leap did not immediately return requests for comment.
text_2: Ultimately, these workplace problems, the lawsuit reads, "renders it so dysfunctional it continues to delay the launch of a product that attracted billions of investment dollars."
prev_text_2: The company is accused of violating the Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, which prohibits employers from discriminating against employees on the basis of sex, race, color, national origin and religion.

text_1_html: This winter 's flooding in Northern California has done more than bring relief after years of drought ; it 's created the prospect of the best gold prospecting in 20 years .
text_2_html: JAMESTOWN , Tuolumne County ( KPIX 5 ) - Weeks of rainy weather across Northern California and the storm runoff through the hills of gold country have triggered a new gold rush .
text_1: This winter's flooding in Northern California has done more than bring relief after years of drought; it's created the prospect of the best gold prospecting in 20 years.
text_2: JAMESTOWN, Tuolumne County (KPIX 5) - Weeks of rainy weather across Northern California and the storm runoff through the hills of gold country have triggered a new gold rush.

text_1_html: She guided the Lady Vols to eight NCAA championships , 32 combined Southeastern Conference titles and became the winningest NCAA D-1 basketball coach of all time on March 22 , 2005 .

text_1_html: The epicenter for the new gold rush could be the Oroville Dam , which nearly catastrophically flooded this winter and required the use of an emergency spillway for the first time .
text_2_html: Thomas said one hot spot this year will be below the Oroville Dam , because the huge water releases from the spillway could reveal some new pockets of gold .

text_1_html: A major snafu has hit benefit payments to student veterans under the GI Bill - and congressional aides tells NBC that they have been told the veterans are never going to be paid back .
text_2_html: NBC News previously reported that some veterans were forced into desperate financial straits stemming from a change in calculating housing allowances under the Forever GI Bill , which President Donald Trump signed into law in July 2017 .

text_1_html: The Daily Beast reported Thursday that a source said to be an ally of AG Jeff Sessions detailed a new effort on the emails front that includes finding more out about the classified correspondence allegedly sent via Clinton 's server , as well as who knew about the info there .
text_2_html: Officials ' questions include how much classified information was sent over Clinton 's server ; who put that information into an unclassified environment , and how ; and which investigators knew about these matters and when .

text_1_html: Magic Leap CEO Rony Abovitz Getty A newly filed lawsuit by a former Magic Leap VP alleges that the company is a hostile working place for women , a condition that has led to the company missing internal deadlines , according to the complaint .
text_2_html: The lawsuit alleged Campbell was fired because the company 's CEO , Rony Abovitz , refused to acknowledge the misogyny within the company and address a hostile work environment .
text_1: Magic Leap CEO Rony Abovitz Getty A newly filed lawsuit by a former Magic Leap VP alleges that the company is a hostile working place for women, a condition that has led to the company missing internal deadlines, according to the complaint.
text_2: The lawsuit alleged Campbell was fired because the company's CEO, Rony Abovitz, refused to acknowledge the misogyny within the company and address a hostile work environment.
prev_text_2: Tannen Campbell, Magic Leap's former vice president of strategic marketing and brand identity, filed the suit in a federal court in the Southern District of Florida.

text_1_html: From the complaint : " The macho bullying atmosphere at Magic Leap fosters a dysfunctional culture which creates chaos and lack of process and structure , hinders the company from achieving key product deadlines ( including launch , which has shifted back at least 4 times in Campbell 's 1.5 years at the company ) and , literally , prevented Campbell from doing the job she was hired to do or achieving the goals she and Abovitz had discussed during her initial interview : helping with the " pink / blue problem " or making Magic Leap less of a " boys club . " "
text_2_html: Missed deadlines Campbell , who is suing for Magic Leap for sex discrimination , retaliation and hostile work environment , connects the lack of women in Magic Leap 's leadership and engineering department with claims of missed internal deadlines .

text_1_html: Eight people have been killed in Afghanistan as protests continue against the burning of the Quran by a controversial US pastor .
text_2_html: The pastor 's " Judge the Quran day " drew widespread international condemnation The Taliban said they had no role in Friday 's assault on the UN office , after both the provincial governor and a senior UN official suggested provocateurs among the crowd had sparked or led the vicious attack .

text_1_html: Raj K . Chohan was walking alongside parked cars on 117th Street and 97th Avenue at about 7 p . m . when she was struck by a gray 2013 Toyota Camry , which then sped off , according to cops .
text_2_html: Raj Chohan , 59 , of Queens , had just parked her car around 7 p . m . Friday at 97th Avenue and 117th Street in Richmond Hill when she was hit by a 2013 Toyota Camry , which then fled , police told 1010 WINS Glenn Schuck .

prev_text_1: A 59 - year - old woman was killed in a hit - and - run crash while visiting a former neighbor to welcome his new daughter - in - law to the family Friday evening , and the man allegedly behind the wheel of the car that hit her was charged with driving drunk , police and the woman  s friend said .

text_1_html: Indian Navy patrolling the Gulf of Aden yesterday thwarted a multi - boat attack by sea brigands on merchant vessels , apprehending 26 Somali pirates and confiscating arms and ammunition , in the fifth successful anti - piracy operation since September .
text_2_html: A five - boat pirate attack on merchant vessels transiting the Gulf of Aden was foiled by an Indian warship that was on escort duty , capturing 26 Somani brigands on three of the skiffs and confiscating their weapons , a naval officer said here Friday .

text_1_html: No militants were inside a United Nations-run school attacked by Israeli forces in Gaza , leaving 40 people dead , the UN says .
text_2_html: SEVENTEEN hours after the attack on one of his schools killed 40 Palestinians seeking shelter from Israel 's war on Hamas , the United Nations ' director of operations in Gaza , John Ging , was certain of at least one thing `` We have established beyond any doubt that the school was not being used by any militants , '' Mr Ging told The Age last night .

text_1_html: A man named " Robert " attempted to send the package to a climate - controlled warehouse in Queens , New York , in December , but custom officials at the Port of Newark seized what turned out to be Picasso 's 1911 La Coiffeuse ( The Hairdresser ) .
text_2_html: The 1911 painting , " La Coiffeuse , " which translates to " The Hairdresser , " was unearthed in December in a FedEx shipment from Belgium to Newark .
text_1: A man named "Robert" attempted to send the package to a climate-controlled warehouse in Queens, New York, in December, but custom officials at the Port of Newark seized what turned out to be Picasso's 1911 La Coiffeuse (The Hairdresser).
prev_text_1: Its papers identified it as a $37 "art craft/toy" and also included the line "Joyeux Noel," or Merry Christmas, the New York Times reports.
text_2: The 1911 painting, "La Coiffeuse," which translates to "The Hairdresser," was unearthed in December in a FedEx shipment from Belgium to Newark.
prev_text_2: A Picasso painting missing from Paris for more than a decade resurfaced in the United States, where it had been shipped under false pretenses as a $37 holiday-themed "art craft."

text_1_html: Juan Manuel Alvarez , 29 year old , was found guilty and sentenced to life in prison without parole by a Los Angeles jury , for murder of 11 people and injuring 180 others .
text_2_html: The jury in the Juan Alvarez murder trial recommended on July 15 , 2008 that Alvarez be sentenced to life in prison without parole .

text_1_html: Cyanide is used in the metal plating industry and to recover silver from used film .
text_2_html: Other uses for cyanide are in galvanizing and other metal plating , in recovering silver from photographs and x - rays , and in fishing .
text_1: Cyanide is used in the metal plating industry and to recover silver from used film.
prev_text_1: A South Carolina mine's reservoir dam broke and spilled sodium cyanide into a creek.
text_2: Other uses for cyanide are in galvanizing and other metal plating, in recovering silver from photographs and x-rays, and in fishing.
prev_text_2: Within a year it had poisoned all the fish in a reservoir 15 miles downstream and threatened irrigation in the valley below.

text_1_html: Croatia and Hungary are considering a liquified petroleum gas terminal on the Adriatic coast and a pipeline to Europe to decrease reliance on Russian gas .
text_2_html: The project , which seeks to address recent disruptions in Russian gas supplies to Europe , calls for building a liquiefied petroleum gas ( LPG ) terminal at an Adriatic port and transporting the gas to central Europe .

text_1_html: Some shops cater to niche markets , others entice customers with special service and community events .
text_2_html: The Book - of - the - Month Club sells general hardcover titles , but it also includes eight other clubs that offer books in niche markets like the One Spirit Christian Book Club or the History Book Club .
text_1: Some shops cater to niche markets, others entice customers with special service and community events.
prev_text_1: The remaining membership has been devising strategies to keep businesses solvent.
text_2: The Book-of-the-Month Club sells general hardcover titles, but it also includes eight other clubs that offer books in niche markets like the One Spirit Christian Book Club or the History Book Club.
prev_text_2: To counter online competition, the book clubs refined their marketing techniques and promoted their ability to filter choice books on specialty topics for harried readers who did not have the time to do it themselves.

text_1_html: While Franks had said he would leave office in January , he now says he will resign Friday after his wife was hospitalized Thursday night " due to an ongoing ailment , " CNN reports .
text_2_html: After discussing options with my family , we came to the conclusion that the best thing for our family now would be for me to tender my previous resignation effective today , December 8th , 2017 . "
text_1: While Franks had said he would leave office in January, he now says he will resign Friday after his wife was hospitalized Thursday night "due to an ongoing ailment," CNN reports.
prev_text_1: Andrea Lafferty, president of the Traditional Values Coalition, says she reported allegations against Franks to House Speaker Paul Ryan in recent weeks, calling his behavior "horrific"-"a powerful man hiring young women, procuring staff, to potentially surrogate children for him."
text_2: After discussing options with my family, we came to the conclusion that the best thing for our family now would be for me to tender my previous resignation effective today, December 8th, 2017."
prev_text_2: He said in a statement Friday: "Last night, my wife was admitted to the hospital in Washington, D.C., due to an ongoing ailment.

text_1_html: Thailand suffers from the cross - border flow of narcotics , HIV , and refugees from Myanmar .

text_1: Thailand suffers from the cross-border flow of narcotics, HIV, and refugees from Myanmar.
prev_text_1: In early October, armed men peacefully seized the Myanmar Embassy in Bangkok, demanding release of political prisoners and recognition of 1990 elections.
text_2: No country in ASEAN suffers more directly from the junta's crimes than host Thailand.
prev_text_2: It is becoming harder and harder for ASEAN members to ignore the depredations of the Burmese junta.

text_1_html: A Picasso painting that was found to have vanished from a Paris museum more than a decade ago has turned up - in the US , in a package shipped from Belgium .

text_1_html: Juan Manuel Alvarez , 29 year old , was found guilty and sentenced to life in prison without parole by a Los Angeles jury , for murder of 11 people and injuring 180 others .
text_2_html: The jury convicted Alvarez on all charges and recommended life without parole instead of death .

text_1_html: A British study found that childhood trauma can lead to heart disease .
text_2_html: Studies show that congenital heart disease ( CHD ) among children AND adults have become more prevalent , air pollution is dangerous for postmenopausal women , and that childhood trauma and stress can lead to increased risks .
text_1: A British study found that childhood trauma can lead to heart disease.

text_1: Police say Allan George Matthews, 56, responded to an online advertisement posted in May by a 52-year-old man requesting help with a medical issue.
prev_text_1: A DIY "doctor" accused of slicing off a man's testicle in a NSW motel room has pleaded guilty to a charge of illicitly removing another person's bodily tissue.

text_1_html: If current trends continue , Mead might never completely refill .
text_2_html: As a result , its two biggest reservoirs , Lake Mead and Lake Powell have become half empty , and may never completely refill .
text_1: If current trends continue, Mead might never completely refill.
prev_text_1: An eight-year drought has slowed the river, leaving Mead now half-full.
text_2: As a result, its two biggest reservoirs, Lake Mead and Lake Powell have become half empty, and may never completely refill.
prev_text_2: The Colorado River, a key water source for seven southwestern U.S. States and Sonora, Mexico, has undergone severe droughts since 2000.

text_1_html: Under the accords , Israel should have completed its pullout from the West Bank town of Hebron in March 1996 , but a series of suicide bombing attacks in February delayed the pullout .
text_2_html: The first Israeli withdrawal from the West Bank was delayed after a series of suicide bombing attacks, and again pending the Israeli elections.
text_1: Under the accords, Israel should have completed its pullout from the West Bank town of Hebron in March 1996, but a series of suicide bombing attacks in February delayed the pullout.
prev_text_1: Palestinians doubted the accords would do anything to improve their plight and Israelis doubted that giving land for peace would provide security.
text_2: The first Israeli withdrawal from the West Bank was delayed after a series of suicide bombing attacks, and again pending the Israeli elections.
prev_text_2: Final status talks would include: the status of Jerusalem; the border of the Palestinian entity; the fate of Palestinian refugees; the future of Jewish settlements in the West Bank; the Gaza Strip; and water.

text_1_html: Andrea Lafferty , president of the Traditional Values Coalition , says she reported allegations against Franks to House Speaker Paul Ryan in recent weeks , calling his behavior " horrific"-"a powerful man hiring young women , procuring staff , to potentially surrogate children for him . "
text_2_html: She came to me shaking and sobbing , and she shared a story that I think is horrific , a powerful man hiring young women , procuring staff , to potentially surrogate children for him , " Lafferty said .
text_1: Andrea Lafferty, president of the Traditional Values Coalition, says she reported allegations against Franks to House Speaker Paul Ryan in recent weeks, calling his behavior "horrific"-"a powerful man hiring young women, procuring staff, to potentially surrogate children for him."
prev_text_1: "I was asked a few times to look over a 'contract' to carry his child, and if I would conceive his child, I would be given $5 million," she tells the AP.
text_2: She came to me shaking and sobbing, and she shared a story that I think is horrific, a powerful man hiring young women, procuring staff, to potentially surrogate children for him," Lafferty said.
prev_text_2: Lafferty said she contacted Ryan's office last month, after the staffer agreed to discuss the incident with leadership.

text_1_html: " I could only move it 10 steps at a time " before she became fatigued , she tells NBC News .
text_2_html: " I could only move it 10 steps at a time , " she said , before getting " very exhausted and sore . "
text_1: "I could only move it 10 steps at a time" before she became fatigued, she tells NBC News.
prev_text_1: She refused to let herself sleep (she was afraid she'd freeze to death), lost one of her boots along the way, and had to pick up one of her own legs and move it with her hands after she pulled a muscle.
text_2: "I could only move it 10 steps at a time," she said, before getting "very exhausted and sore."
prev_text_2: But after walking for miles, she had pulled a muscle near her hip and lost a shoe due to compacted snow.

text_1: "I could only move it 10 steps at a time" before she became fatigued, she tells NBC News.
prev_text_1: She refused to let herself sleep (she was afraid she'd freeze to death), lost one of her boots along the way, and had to pick up one of her own legs and move it with her hands after she pulled a muscle.
text_2: "I could only move it 10 steps at a time," she said, before getting "very exhausted and sore."
prev_text_2: But after walking for miles, she had pulled a muscle near her hip and lost a shoe due to compacted snow.

text_1_html: Spain 's Socialist party has pulled out of the three - party Basque regional government because of links between the coalition 's principal member and an outside group allied to the armed separatist organization ETA .
text_2_html: The Socialists , the leading opposition party in Spain 's national parliament , announced the split accusing the Basque Nationalist Party of getting too close to Herri Batasuna , the political wing of ETA .

text_1_html: Terje Roed-Larsen, the UN secretary general's envoy for Lebanon, is to meet Syria's President Bashir Al-Assad in Damascus on Sunday to discuss the Syrian withdrawal and the UN resolution.
text_2_html: U.N. envoy Terje Roed - Larsen met Syrian President Bashar Assad for two hours in Damascus on Sunday amid accusations that Syria has not withdrawn all its intelligence agents from Lebanon and was continuing to meddle in Lebanese affairs .
text_1: Terje Roed-Larsen, the UN secretary general's envoy for Lebanon, is to meet Syria's President Bashir Al-Assad in Damascus on Sunday to discuss the Syrian withdrawal and the UN resolution.

text_1_html: The last radar signal from Kennedy 's plane was received at 9:38 p.m. , as the plane made its approach into Martha 's Vineyard .
text_2_html: At 9:39 p.m. , about an hour into his flight - and less than 20 miles from the Martha 's Vineyard airport - Kennedy 's plane vanished from air - traffic control radar screens .
text_1: The last radar signal from Kennedy's plane was received at 9:38 p.m., as the plane made its approach into Martha's Vineyard.
prev_text_1: The flight was expected to arrive at Martha's Vineyard Airport at about 10 p.m., but never did.
text_2: At 9:39 p.m., about an hour into his flight - and less than 20 miles from the Martha's Vineyard airport - Kennedy's plane vanished from air-traffic control radar screens.
prev_text_2: Kennedy, a fledgling pilot, was at the controls of a newly-purchased, high-performance airplane from Fairfield, N.J. to Martha's Vineyard last Friday just after sunset, en route to a cousin's wedding in Hyannis Port the next day.

text_1_html: The company established joint distribution , marketing and sales arrangements with Pepsi Cola ( for Starbucks Frappuccino ) , Kraft Foods ( for coffee beans ) and Drayer 's Grand Ice Cream ( for Starbucks ice cream . ) .
text_2_html: Most of it has been joint ventures : the ice cream with Dreyer 's Grand Ice Cream ; the bottled Frappuccino with Pepsi - Cola ; and the supermarket distribution of Starbucks coffee with Kraft Foods Inc. The company has just introduced a line of premium chocolates in its stores , but made no announcement about any other channel of distibution .
text_1: The company established joint distribution, marketing and sales arrangements with Pepsi Cola (for Starbucks Frappuccino), Kraft Foods (for coffee beans) and Drayer's Grand Ice Cream (for Starbucks ice cream.).
prev_text_1: Starbucks formed alliances with American Airlines, Barnes & Noble, and the Starwood Hotel chain.
text_2: Most of it has been joint ventures: the ice cream with Dreyer's Grand Ice Cream; the bottled Frappuccino with Pepsi-Cola; and the supermarket distribution of Starbucks coffee with Kraft Foods Inc. The company has just introduced a line of premium chocolates in its stores, but made no announcement about any other channel of distibution.
prev_text_2: The new division will take over business that already brought in $206 million last year, or almost 16 percent of the company's total sales.

text_1_html: A body is removed from the scene of a wreck involving a Ride the Ducks vehicle and a charter bus on Seattle 's Aurora Bridge on Sept. 24 , 2015 .

text_1_html: The firm announced a widely expected refresh of its 17in MacBook Pro , with a battery that the firm said will offer eight hours of operation , but which is not removable from the case .
text_2_html: Apple on Tuesday launched a refresh of the 17-inch MacBook Pro , giving the company 's largest laptop an eight-hour battery life , a faster Intel ( NSDQ : INTC ) processor , and better graphics capabilities .

text_1_html: The term " wetlands " describes marshes , swamps , bogs and similar areas usually situated between dry land and bodies of water .
text_2_html: Wetlands are bodies of land under water at least part of the year , and include marshland , lakes , rivers , and swamps .

text_1_html: Military aircraft from Sudan crossed the new international border with South Sudan and dropped bombs Thursday in and around a camp filled with refugees , officials said .

text_1_html: The United Nations was encouraged by the talks its envoy had with Syria 's president on the Security Council call for Syria to end its involvement in Lebanon , the U.N. said in a statement Monday .
text_2_html: Terje Roed-Larsen, the UN secretary general's envoy for Lebanon, is to meet Syria's President Bashir Al-Assad in Damascus on Sunday to discuss the Syrian withdrawal and the UN resolution.
text_1: The United Nations was encouraged by the talks its envoy had with Syria's president on the Security Council call for Syria to end its involvement in Lebanon, the U.N. said in a statement Monday.
text_2: Terje Roed-Larsen, the UN secretary general's envoy for Lebanon, is to meet Syria's President Bashir Al-Assad in Damascus on Sunday to discuss the Syrian withdrawal and the UN resolution.

text_1_html: Military aircraft from Sudan crossed the new international border with South Sudan and dropped bombs Thursday in and around a camp filled with refugees , officials said .

text_1_html: A Lebanese TV channel affiliated with Hezbollah reported Sunday that the drone that infiltrated Israeli airspace on Saturday belonged to the Shiite terror group .
text_2_html: Israeli warplanes swooped low over Lebanese villages Sunday in a menacing show of force apparently aimed at the Hezbollah guerrilla group after a mysterious raid by an unmanned aircraft that was shot out of Israeli skies over the weekend .

text_1_html: Nucor Company in Crawfordville , Indiana was the first to pioneer the new technology and became the only major steel company to show a profit in the late 1980s and early 1990s .

text_1_html: The administration has prohibited its scientists , when acting as government representatives , from linking human factors to polar bears and global warming .
text_2_html: Government balked because it would mean limiting global warming , and prevented scientists from speaking freely .
text_1: The administration has prohibited its scientists, when acting as government representatives, from linking human factors to polar bears and global warming.
prev_text_1: The designation prohibits federal agencies from authorizing anything, including oil drilling, that would harm the bears' habitat.

text_1_html: The administration has prohibited its scientists , when acting as government representatives , from linking human factors to polar bears and global warming .
text_2_html: Government balked because it would mean limiting global warming , and prevented scientists from speaking freely .
text_1: The administration has prohibited its scientists, when acting as government representatives, from linking human factors to polar bears and global warming.
prev_text_1: The designation prohibits federal agencies from authorizing anything, including oil drilling, that would harm the bears' habitat.
text_2: Government balked because it would mean limiting global warming, and prevented scientists from speaking freely.
prev_text_2: Environmental groups sued to force a ''threatened'' designation requiring the U.S. to create a polar bear recovery plan.

text_1_html: RBC Capital Markets downgraded ATI Technologies to `` sector perform '' from `` outperform '' after Advanced Micro Devices announced its intention to buy the Canadian graphics chip-maker for $ 5.4 billion on Monday .
text_2_html: AMD agreed to buy Markham , Ont-based ATI for around $ 5.4 billion in cash and stock , the companies announced Monday .
text_1: RBC Capital Markets downgraded ATI Technologies to `` sector perform '' from `` outperform '' after Advanced Micro Devices announced its intention to buy the Canadian graphics chip-maker for $ 5.4 billion on Monday .
text_2: AMD agreed to buy Markham , Ont-based ATI for around $ 5.4 billion in cash and stock , the companies announced Monday .

prev_text_2: Yushchenko was sworn in as President of Ukraine on Sunday 23 January.

text_1_html: RBC Capital Markets downgraded ATI Technologies to `` sector perform '' from `` outperform '' after Advanced Micro Devices announced its intention to buy the Canadian graphics chip-maker for $ 5.4 billion on Monday .

text_1_html: On Saturday , the 26-year-old was handed the keys to the Tardis when he was unveiled as the 11th Doctor Who , replacing David Tennant , who steps down later this year .
text_2_html: A relative unknown will take over the title role of Doctor Who in the British science fiction television show , making him the 11th time lord in 45 years to travel across the universe in the Tardis time-ship .

text_1_html: The British embassy in Yangon denied allegations in Myanmar 's state - run press that opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi is a British citizen , while military - run newspapers on Friday renewed threats to deport the Nobel laureate .

text_1_html: The project , which seeks to address recent disruptions in Russian gas supplies to Europe , calls for building a liquiefied petroleum gas ( LPG ) terminal at an Adriatic port and transporting the gas to central Europe .
text_2_html: " We would like to build a terminal for liquiefied petroleum gas on the ( Adriatic ) coast , from which we can have pipelines reaching into Europe , " Hungarian Prime Minister Ferenc Gyurcsany said at a press conference .

text_1_html: The quake virtually leveled parts of Izmit , 60 miles east of Istanbul , and other towns in western Turkey .
text_2_html: The quake almost leveled parts of Izmit , 60 miles east of Istanbul , as well as other towns in western Turkey .

text_1_html: Newt Gingrich and Marianne Gingrich spent Thursday afternoon with a mediator in their first attempt to resolve their bitter divorce .
text_2_html: The settlement closes five months of bitter legal wrangling in the case , culminating with Gingrich 's admission last month that he 's had a romantic relationship with a Washington congressional aide for six years .

text_1_html: Exercise - especially gentle and progressive resistance exercise that strengthens leg muscles - is getting increased attention among arthritis researchers .
text_2_html: A Tufts University study presented at the Boston rheumatology meeting showed a home exercise regimen improved leg strength by 71 percent and reduced arthritic knee pain by 36 percent .
text_1: Exercise - especially gentle and progressive resistance exercise that strengthens leg muscles - is getting increased attention among arthritis researchers.
prev_text_1: Framingham data show that a weight loss of 11 pounds in women of medium height reduced the risk of painful knee arthritis by half.
text_2: A Tufts University study presented at the Boston rheumatology meeting showed a home exercise regimen improved leg strength by 71 percent and reduced arthritic knee pain by 36 percent.
prev_text_2: Increased joint stability in turn protects cartilage from the cycle of injury, enzymatic breakdown, and inflammation.

text_1_html: An important source of vitamin D is sunshine which may explain people in warmer climates have more of it and a lower incidence of these cancers than people in more northern areas .
text_2_html: Both studies found that taking 2000 international units of vitamin D3 daily , and a little sunshine could cut breast cancer cases by half and colorectal by two - thirds .
text_1: An important source of vitamin D is sunshine which may explain people in warmer climates have more of it and a lower incidence of these cancers than people in more northern areas.
prev_text_1: There are no findings for darker skinned people.
text_2: Both studies found that taking 2000 international units of vitamin D3 daily, and a little sunshine could cut breast cancer cases by half and colorectal by two-thirds.
prev_text_2: Two new vitamin D studies, published by Moores Cancer Center, University of California, San Diego, in February 2007, revealed new prescriptions for preventing breast and colorectal cancers.

text_1_html: A stolen Picasso worth millions of dollars was shipped to the U.S. in a package that described it as a $ 37 " art craft " - but it will soon be on its way back to France .
text_2_html: It was shipped by Federal Express from Belgium in December and seized at the Port of Newark .
text_1: A stolen Picasso worth millions of dollars was shipped to the U.S. in a package that described it as a $37 "art craft" - but it will soon be on its way back to France.
text_2: It was shipped by Federal Express from Belgium in December and seized at the Port of Newark.
prev_text_2: The canvas, titled "La Coiffeuse," was bequeathed to France's National Museum and was placed in storage at the Centre Georges Pompidou, where staffers discovered it was missing when they received a loan request for it.

text_1_html: Doctor Who boss Steven Moffat has revealed that Peter Capaldi was the only name considered to take over from Matt Smith .
text_2_html: Peter Capaldi , the bookmakers' choice by a wide margin , will take over for the retiring Matt Smith , the Doctor since 2010 .
text_1: Doctor Who boss Steven Moffat has revealed that Peter Capaldi was the only name considered to take over from Matt Smith .
prev_text_1: Showrunner , 51 , adds that Malcolm Tucker will not cast a shadow over new Time Lord : "You know when the Doctor is in the room"
text_2: Peter Capaldi , the bookmakers' choice by a wide margin , will take over for the retiring Matt Smith , the Doctor since 2010 .
prev_text_2: And as the world ( or one obsessed subset thereof ) watched , the name of the person to play the Twelfth Doctor - though not , of course , the name of the Doctor , which shall remain unspoken - was revealed .

text_1_html: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced Friday that Hugh Jackman will be the host of the 81st annual Oscars on Feb. 22 at the Kodak Theatre .
text_2_html: Okay , so it 's a bit of a stretch there , but regardless , today it was announced that one of our own , Hugh Jackman , will be the host of the ceremony , televised live on Sunday , February 22 , 2009 , from the Kodak Theatre at Hollywood and Highland Center on ABC .

text_1_html: A judge ruled Thursday that a congressional aide linked romantically with former House Speaker Newt Gingrich must testify in his divorce case .
text_2_html: In pleadings released in Cobb County Superior Court , Gingrich , 56 , is demanding that Marianne Gingrich sit for a videotaped deposition on Oct. 19 - just as she has demanded a videotaped interrogation of Callista Bisek , a House Agriculture Committee aide .
text_1: A judge ruled Thursday that a congressional aide linked romantically with former House Speaker Newt Gingrich must testify in his divorce case.
text_2: In pleadings released in Cobb County Superior Court, Gingrich, 56, is demanding that Marianne Gingrich sit for a videotaped deposition on Oct. 19 - just as she has demanded a videotaped interrogation of Callista Bisek, a House Agriculture Committee aide.
prev_text_2: Gingrich, who rose to power by aggressively attacking Democrats in Congress, will now put the same energy toward proving that his wife shares the blame for the marriage's collapse, one of his attorneys said Tuesday.

text_1_html: To meet online competition , the ABA opened Book Sense and Contentville , online selling and commentary sites serving as hubs for individual stores .
text_2_html: The Independents also established its own national online store , Book Sense , to stave off fierce competition from Amazon.com and Barnesandnoble.com .
text_1: To meet online competition, the ABA opened Book Sense and Contentville, online selling and commentary sites serving as hubs for individual stores.
prev_text_1: It censured author Frank McCourt for participating in chainstore advertising, challenged barnesandnoble.com's claim "If we don't have your book nobody does," led successful opposition to B&N's plan to purchase the largest book distributor (threatening independents with reduced service and compromised records), and joined the Northern California Independent Booksellers Association in urging collection of taxes from on-line bookstores.
text_2: The Independents also established its own national online store, Book Sense, to stave off fierce competition from Amazon.com and Barnesandnoble.com.
prev_text_2: Barnes&Noble established an online venture that in at least one year lost money.

text_1_html: After Libby 's indictment , reporter Bob Woodward told Special Prosecutor Patrick Fitzgerald that about one month before Valerie Plame 's identity was exposed , he had learned it from another Bush administration official ( not Libby ) .
text_2_html: The Special Counsel disputes that claim .
text_1: After Libby's indictment, reporter Bob Woodward told Special Prosecutor Patrick Fitzgerald that about one month before Valerie Plame's identity was exposed, he had learned it from another Bush administration official (not Libby).

text_1_html: US lawmakers ripped into Major League Baseball 's new drug testing plan , describing it as shamefully inadequate on the eve of a Congressional hearing into rampant steroid taking by stars .

text_1_html: The Pompidou 's director , who called the painting 's rediscovery a " true comfort , " hopes the painting can go on display at the museum as early as May , the AP reports .

text_1_html: Martha Stewart , the billionaire entrepreneur who was convicted a year ago of lying to federal investigators , left prison early Friday in Alderson , W.Va . , after serving a five - month sentence .
text_2_html: US lifestyle guru Martha Stewart is expected to leave jail on Friday after a five - month sentence for a stock scandal that reinvigorated her career rather than dooming it .

text_1_html: The Indian Navy patrolling the Gulf of Aden on Thursday thwarted a multi - boat attack by sea brigands on merchant vessels , apprehending 26 Somali pirates and confiscating arms and ammunition , in the fifth successful anti - piracy operation since September .
text_2_html: Indian Naval ship , INS Sukanya , thwarted a piracy attack in the Gulf of Aden and captured three boats of the pirates .

text_1_html: BEIJING ( AP ) - Chinese couples will find it easier and foreigners perhaps more difficult to adopt children under a revised adoption law approved by China 's legislature Wednesday , state media reported .
text_2_html: The existing law on adoption placed excessive restrictions on people who are fully capable and willing to adopt children , and prolonged overcrowding in government institutions for orphans and handicapped minors , according to Doje .
text_1: BEIJING (AP) - Chinese couples will find it easier and foreigners perhaps more difficult to adopt children under a revised adoption law approved by China's legislature Wednesday, state media reported.
text_2: The existing law on adoption placed excessive restrictions on people who are fully capable and willing to adopt children, and prolonged overcrowding in government institutions for orphans and handicapped minors, according to Doje.
prev_text_2: He said the purposed relaxing restrictions on domestic adoptions are to provide more orphans with access to family warmth and ensure healthy growth.

text_1_html: In another successful anti-piracy operation , Navy warship on Saturday repulsed an attack on a merchant vessel in the Gulf of Aden and nabbed 23 Somali and Yemeni sea brigands , in a show of resolve to weed out the menace that affected maritime trade in the region .
text_2_html: Striking yet another blow at the very heart of piracy in the Gulf of Aden , Indian warship INS Mysore and its marine commandos thwarted a hijack attempt on an Ethiopian merchant vessel on Saturday and captured 23 pirates and a large arms cache in the operation .

text_1_html: A man named " Robert " attempted to send the package to a climate - controlled warehouse in Queens , New York , in December , but custom officials at the Port of Newark seized what turned out to be Picasso 's 1911 La Coiffeuse ( The Hairdresser ) .
text_2_html: PARIS ( AP ) - The Pompidou Centre in Paris hopes to display a long - vanished Picasso painting in May , now that it has been recovered by U.S. customs authorities .
text_1: A man named "Robert" attempted to send the package to a climate-controlled warehouse in Queens, New York, in December, but custom officials at the Port of Newark seized what turned out to be Picasso's 1911 La Coiffeuse (The Hairdresser).

text_1_html: U.S. officials said Thursday Washington was certain that Syrian military intelligence operatives remain in Lebanon in defiance of international demands to withdraw all forces and agents .

text_1_html: As a white lawyer , Dees has been instrumental in crusading against racial intolerance by using lawsuits to destroy the finances of hate groups .

text_1: As a white lawyer, Dees has been instrumental in crusading against racial intolerance by using lawsuits to destroy the finances of hate groups.
prev_text_1: The law center's co-founder and chief trial counsel, Morris Dees, has successfully handled civil rights cases for more than 30 years--in 1973 his federal lawsuit had the practical effect of forcing funeral homes to provide equal services to blacks and whites.

text_1_html: A body is removed from the scene of a wreck involving a Ride the Ducks vehicle and a charter bus on Seattle 's Aurora Bridge on Sept. 24 , 2015 .
text_2_html: Update at 1:07 p.m. Friday : Students from four countries were killed in Thursday 's collision on the Aurora Bridge between a tour bus of international students and a Ride the Ducks vehicle .
text_1: A body is removed from the scene of a wreck involving a Ride the Ducks vehicle and a charter bus on Seattle's Aurora Bridge on Sept. 24, 2015.

text_1_html: Even as Oscar organizers on Friday unveiled Hugh Jackman as the host of their gala film awards , the prospect of a U.S. actors strike was casting a long shadow over whether Hollywood 's big show would go on as usual .
text_2_html: Hugh Jackman , the Australian actor known to film audiences for playing a furry comic-book hero in the X-Men movies , will be host of the 81st incarnation of the Oscars , the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced on Friday .
text_1: Even as Oscar organizers on Friday unveiled Hugh Jackman as the host of their gala film awards , the prospect of a U.S. actors strike was casting a long shadow over whether Hollywood 's big show would go on as usual .
text_2: Hugh Jackman , the Australian actor known to film audiences for playing a furry comic-book hero in the X-Men movies , will be host of the 81st incarnation of the Oscars , the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced on Friday .
prev_text_2: The producers of the Academy Awards are counting on a mutant wolverine who is People magazine 's reigning Sexiest Man Alive to inject some desperately needed razzle-dazzle into their annual telecast .

text_1_html: Dan Brown has topped Oxfam 's ' most donated ' list again , his fourth consecutive year .
text_2_html: Whether a sign of a good read ; or a comment on the ' pulp ' nature of some genres of fiction , the Oxfam second - hand book charts have remained in The Da Vinci Code author 's favour for the past four years .

text_1_html: After blowing through the initial deadline to bring its GI Bill housing stipends in line with the Forever GI Bill law , Veterans Affairs Department officials said Wednesday that they will not be able to implement the fix until December 2019 .
text_2_html: That 's why we are resetting our implementation of the law for the next year to ensure we get the technology and formula right to put Veterans first , " VA Sec .
text_1: After blowing through the initial deadline to bring its GI Bill housing stipends in line with the Forever GI Bill law, Veterans Affairs Department officials said Wednesday that they will not be able to implement the fix until December 2019.
text_2: That's why we are resetting our implementation of the law for the next year to ensure we get the technology and formula right to put Veterans first," VA Sec.
prev_text_2: "Redesigning the way (Veterans Benefits Administration) calculates Post-9/11 GI Bill housing rates during a busy academic season was like flying a plane while building it, and that was unfair and frustrating to veterans and taxpayers.

text_1_html: In the video , recorded on a surveillance camera at the airport , Ronald Tigner -- a frequent flyer , father and grandfather -- is shown being pushed to the ground by a United Airlines customer service rep , right in front of the United ticket counter .

text_2_html: Other companies using or planning to use this technology are ARMCO ( from the US steel group ) , Chapparal , Birmingham , Altos Hornos de Vizcaya in Spain , ISCOR in South Africa , EKO - Stahl in Germany , a joint Broken Hill Proprietary and North Star Steel venture , and a joint LTV , British Steel and Sumitomo Metal Industries venture .
text_1: Mini-mills also went up in Spain, South Africa, Italy, Germany and Holland.
prev_text_1: Three big steelmakers from the U.S., U.K. and Japan joined forces to produce low-cost steel in the U.S. Even U.S. Steel announced plans to construct a mini-mill in Ohio.

text_1_html: A stolen Picasso worth millions of dollars was shipped to the U.S. in a package that described it as a $ 37 " art craft " - but it will soon be on its way back to France .

text_1_html: On November 12 , a jury in Redwood City , California , convicted Scott Peterson of first-degree murder in the death of his wife , 23-year-old Laci , and second-degree murder in the death of his 8-month-old unborn son , whom the couple were planning to name Conner .
text_2_html: The jury convicted the 32-year-old Peterson on Nov. 12 of first-degree murder for killing his wife and second-degree murder for the death of his unborn son .
text_1: On November 12 , a jury in Redwood City , California , convicted Scott Peterson of first-degree murder in the death of his wife , 23-year-old Laci , and second-degree murder in the death of his 8-month-old unborn son , whom the couple were planning to name Conner .
text_2: The jury convicted the 32-year-old Peterson on Nov. 12 of first-degree murder for killing his wife and second-degree murder for the death of his unborn son .
prev_text_2: Laci Peterson 's loved ones have `` a hole in their hearts that will never be repaired , '' a prosecutor told jurors today as he asked them to send convicted double-murderer Scott Peterson to his death for killing his wife and unborn son .

text_1_html: Authorities say the painting worth millions of dollars was ... ( Associated Press ) The 1911 cubist painting " The Hairdresser , " worth millions of dollars , was reported missing from a Pompidou storeroom in 2001 .
text_2_html: The canvas , titled " La Coiffeuse , " was bequeathed to France 's National Museum and was placed in storage at the Centre Georges Pompidou , where staffers discovered it was missing when they received a loan request for it .
text_1: Authorities say the painting worth millions of dollars was... (Associated Press) The 1911 cubist painting "The Hairdresser," worth millions of dollars, was reported missing from a Pompidou storeroom in 2001.
prev_text_1: This undated photo provided by the United States Department of Justice, shows a cubist painting entitled "The Hairdresser" by Pablo Picasso.
text_2: The canvas, titled "La Coiffeuse," was bequeathed to France's National Museum and was placed in storage at the Centre Georges Pompidou, where staffers discovered it was missing when they received a loan request for it.
prev_text_2: "A lost treasure has been found," U.S. Attorney Loretta Lynch said in a statement.

text_1_html: On November 12 , a jury in Redwood City , California , convicted Scott Peterson of first-degree murder in the death of his wife , 23-year-old Laci , and second-degree murder in the death of his 8-month-old unborn son , whom the couple were planning to name Conner .
text_2_html: A jury found Scott Peterson guilty Friday of killing his pregnant wife , Laci , and their unborn child in the saga of suburban adultery and betrayal that transfixed much of the nation for nearly two years .
text_1: On November 12 , a jury in Redwood City , California , convicted Scott Peterson of first-degree murder in the death of his wife , 23-year-old Laci , and second-degree murder in the death of his 8-month-old unborn son , whom the couple were planning to name Conner .
text_2: A jury found Scott Peterson guilty Friday of killing his pregnant wife , Laci , and their unborn child in the saga of suburban adultery and betrayal that transfixed much of the nation for nearly two years .

text_1_html: But putting a hate group out of business is n't easy : While Dees has won significant civil judgments against the Ku Klux Klan and the White Aryan Resistance , the groups have survived .
text_2_html: Over the last two decades , the Southern Poverty Law Center has taken the Ku Klux Klan and other hate groups to court , starting with a successful suit against the Invisible Empire Klan , which in 1979 attacked a group of peaceful civil rights marchers in Decatur , Ala.
text_1: But putting a hate group out of business isn't easy: While Dees has won significant civil judgments against the Ku Klux Klan and the White Aryan Resistance, the groups have survived.
prev_text_1: He even suggested turning the 20-acre Aryan Nations compound into a center for tolerance, teaching about the Holocaust.
text_2: Over the last two decades, the Southern Poverty Law Center has taken the Ku Klux Klan and other hate groups to court, starting with a successful suit against the Invisible Empire Klan, which in 1979 attacked a group of peaceful civil rights marchers in Decatur, Ala.
prev_text_2: Mark Thomas, the leader of the Aryan Nations in Pennsylvania, confessed to being part of another terrorist group, the Aryan Republican Army, that in the mid-1990s robbed 22 Midwestern banks in an effort to finance a white supremacist revolution.

text_1_html: " Miner Gary " Thomas said he always finds at least a little gold here on his property near Jamestown in Tuolumne County , but this year , there 's so much more runoff than normal and it 's shaking the gold from these hills .
text_2_html: The runoffs have also removed gold out of the old abandoned mines and sent it down the river .
text_1: "Miner Gary" Thomas said he always finds at least a little gold here on his property near Jamestown in Tuolumne County, but this year, there's so much more runoff than normal and it's shaking the gold from these hills.
prev_text_1: JAMESTOWN, Tuolumne County (KPIX 5) - Weeks of rainy weather across Northern California and the storm runoff through the hills of gold country have triggered a new gold rush.
text_2: The runoffs have also removed gold out of the old abandoned mines and sent it down the river.
prev_text_2: The known gold digs were washed out, trees uprooted, and landscape eroded.

text_1_html: Hugh Jackman , the Australian actor known to film audiences for playing a furry comic-book hero in the X-Men movies , will be host of the 81st incarnation of the Oscars , the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced on Friday .
text_2_html: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced Friday that Hugh Jackman will be the host of the 81st annual Oscars on Feb. 22 at the Kodak Theatre .
text_1: Hugh Jackman , the Australian actor known to film audiences for playing a furry comic-book hero in the X-Men movies , will be host of the 81st incarnation of the Oscars , the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced on Friday .

text_1_html: A joint venture with Dreyer 's Grand Ice Cream was followed by an unsuccessful attempt to buy Williams - Sonoma and its internet market .
text_2_html: Most of it has been joint ventures : the ice cream with Dreyer 's Grand Ice Cream ; the bottled Frappuccino with Pepsi - Cola ; and the supermarket distribution of Starbucks coffee with Kraft Foods Inc. The company has just introduced a line of premium chocolates in its stores , but made no announcement about any other channel of distibution .
text_1: A joint venture with Dreyer's Grand Ice Cream was followed by an unsuccessful attempt to buy Williams-Sonoma and its internet market.
prev_text_1: Pepsi-Cola signed on as a distributor of Starbucks Frappucino blended coffee while a licensing agreement with Kraft provided for distribution of Starbucks coffee beans to supermarkets.
text_2: Most of it has been joint ventures: the ice cream with Dreyer's Grand Ice Cream; the bottled Frappuccino with Pepsi-Cola; and the supermarket distribution of Starbucks coffee with Kraft Foods Inc. The company has just introduced a line of premium chocolates in its stores, but made no announcement about any other channel of distibution.
prev_text_2: The new division will take over business that already brought in $206 million last year, or almost 16 percent of the company's total sales.

text_1_html: Federal prosecutors in Brooklyn filed papers Thursday to forfeit the century - old cubist painting , which was swiped from a museum storeroom in 2001 .
text_2_html: The canvas , titled " La Coiffeuse , " was bequeathed to France 's National Museum and was placed in storage at the Centre Georges Pompidou , where staffers discovered it was missing when they received a loan request for it .
text_1: Federal prosecutors in Brooklyn filed papers Thursday to forfeit the century-old cubist painting, which was swiped from a museum storeroom in 2001.
prev_text_1: A stolen Picasso worth millions of dollars was shipped to the U.S. in a package that described it as a $37 "art craft" - but it will soon be on its way back to France.
text_2: The canvas, titled "La Coiffeuse," was bequeathed to France's National Museum and was placed in storage at the Centre Georges Pompidou, where staffers discovered it was missing when they received a loan request for it.
prev_text_2: "A lost treasure has been found," U.S. Attorney Loretta Lynch said in a statement.

text_1_html: A Picasso painting missing from Paris for more than a decade resurfaced in the United States , where it had been shipped under false pretenses as a $ 37 holiday - themed " art craft . "
text_2_html: PARIS ( AP ) - The Pompidou Centre in Paris hopes to display a long - vanished Picasso painting in May , now that it has been recovered by U.S. customs authorities .

text_1_html: After blowing through the initial deadline to bring its GI Bill housing stipends in line with the Forever GI Bill law , Veterans Affairs Department officials said Wednesday that they will not be able to implement the fix until December 2019 .
text_2_html: Given that the VA has said the tech problems will continue until the end of 2019 , this protection is a sensible step .
text_1: After blowing through the initial deadline to bring its GI Bill housing stipends in line with the Forever GI Bill law, Veterans Affairs Department officials said Wednesday that they will not be able to implement the fix until December 2019.
text_2: Given that the VA has said the tech problems will continue until the end of 2019, this protection is a sensible step.
prev_text_2: This would address a major concern that students with accounts in arrears due to delayed payments may not be allowed to enroll for 2019 coursework.

text_1_html: A Picasso painting missing from Paris for more than a decade resurfaced in the United States , where it had been shipped under false pretenses as a $ 37 holiday - themed " art craft . "
text_2_html: It was smuggled into the U.S. in December from Belgium .
text_1: A Picasso painting missing from Paris for more than a decade resurfaced in the United States, where it had been shipped under false pretenses as a $37 holiday-themed "art craft."
text_2: It was smuggled into the U.S. in December from Belgium.
prev_text_2: The 1911 cubist painting "The Hairdresser," worth millions of dollars, was reported missing from a Pompidou storeroom in 2001.

text_1_html: CNN medical reporter and Grady hospital neurosurgeon Dr. Sanjay Gupta has been approached by the Obama administration to fill the post of U.S. Surgeon General , CNN officials confirmed Tuesday .
text_2_html: CNN management said : `` Since first learning that Dr Gupta was under consideration for the surgeon-general position , CNN has made sure his on-air reporting has been on health and wellness matters and not on healthcare policy or any matters involving the new administration . ''
text_1: CNN medical reporter and Grady hospital neurosurgeon Dr. Sanjay Gupta has been approached by the Obama administration to fill the post of U.S. Surgeon General , CNN officials confirmed Tuesday .

prev_text_2: CNN 's management confirmed yesterday that Dr Gupta had been approached by the Obama team .
